name: For Them
description:
For Them is a 2D Platform-Puzzle with elements of Stealth that uses time travel. In an anti-utopian future, you will infiltrate a military base without being seen using just a time machine. A short and immersive experience, in which you follow the moral dilemma of Dwayne, a spy who must complete one last mission before returning to his home.

- Time Travel
Traveling between the present and the future opens up a new range of possibilities for platform and puzzle challenges.

- Stealth Mission
You are infiltrating a hostile location, proceed with care so as not to be seen by the military.

- Captivating History
Inserted in the middle of a conflict between nations, Dwayne's journey focuses on his point of view and his reflections.
